metadata.title: CVE-2013-6401 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Jansson, possibly 2.4 and earlier, does not restrict the ability to triggerhash collisions predictably, which allows context-dependent attackers tocause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted JSON document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjansson4 - 2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jansson package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-1').
